facts: Infernorifts is a Minecraft community server with guides, features and support available on the wiki.
By default players can hold up to 3 jobs at a time on Infernorifts.
Upgradeable Hoppers let players remotely collect items and configure filters (see the FAQ for details).
Players can open the Jobs menu with /jobs browse and view daily quests via /jobs quests.
For disputes or refunds, email infernoriftsmc@gmail.com or open a Discord support ticket for game issues.
The FAQ and help pages (Getting Started, Commands, Server Rules) are available at the wiki for newcomers.

faqs.how do i join the server?: Java / Bedrock: connect to play.infernorifts.com (port 25565). Console players can use the Realm Code YtF2cfjBwBJRkSE.
faqs.where do i report a problem or open a su: Open a support ticket in the Discord server (https://discord.gg/5hTuD7UknX) for any game-related questions — email infernoriftsmc@gmail.com for disputes/refunds.
faqs.what are jobs and daily quests?: Jobs are a source of in-game income. Use /jobs browse to view and join jobs. After joining, daily quests for the job become available (use /jobs quests).
faqs.how do i get crate keys?: You can earn or purchase crate keys from the server via gameplay, events, or the key shop. Refer to the Crates FAQ page for more details.
faqs.where can i find commands?: Use the Commands page on the wiki (commands.html) for a categorized list of available server commands.
faqs.what are upgradeable hoppers?: Upgradeable Hoppers are remote collectors that can be purchased in the Utilities shop (/utilshop) — see the Upgradeable Hoppers FAQ for usage and limits.
